All Classes

Class Description
AllGameCards
The type containing all the ClientDevCard and all the ClientLeaderCard.
BasicData
The default type of a player client side, it extends PlayerData and it's the player without any ClientLeaderCard played.
BasicDevSpace
The type of the Basic Development Space where every player has their Basic Production Power.
BasicPlayer
The type Basic player (it extends Player) It's the player without any LeaderCard.
Board
The player's Board with the references to player's WareHouse, StrongBox, Slot, FaithPath and BasicDevSpace
BuyDevRequest
The Request sent by a player when he wants to buy a DevCard.
BuyDevSelection
The Selection that guides the player when he chose to buy a development card.
BuyDevUpdate
The Update sent after that a Player buys a DevCard.
ChangeResData
It's the player with the ClientChangeRes ClientLeaderCard (it extends PlayerData).
ChangeResource
The LeaderCard that gives the Player the possibility to change an white marble with an other Resource.
ChangeResPlayer
The type Change Resource player (it extends Player).
CheckStatsSelection
The Selection that show player his status.
CheckUpdate
Update used for checking the status of the client
ClientChangeRes
The ClientLeaderCard that gives the PlayerData the possibility to change an white marble with an other Resource.
ClientDefaultCreator
Class that can create all the Client cards and give them to the players when required.
ClientDevCard
A Client development card is a light version of the Development Card on the server.
ClientDiscount
The ClientLeaderCard that allows the PlayerData to pay a Resource less when buys a ClientDevCard from the table.
ClientExtraDep
The ClientLeaderCard that gives to the PlayerData an extra level in his warehouse.
ClientExtraProd
The ClientLeaderCard that gives to the PlayerData an extra production power.
ClientHandler
The type Client handler.
ClientLeaderCard
A Client Leader card is a light version of the Leader Card on the server.
Colors
The enum Colors used by ClientDevCard.
ConnectionErrorUpdate  
Constants
The Market's dimensions.
Convertible  
DefaultCreator
Class used if the player picks to use the default settings for leader and developer cards.
DevCard
The card that allows the Player to produce Resource from other Resource.
DiscardCards
That type of Token that, if drawn, remove two DevCard from the table.
DiscardLeaderRequest
The Request sent by a player when he wants to discard a LeaderCard.
DiscardLeaderSelection
The Selection that guides the player when he chose to discard a leader card.
DiscardLeaderUpdate
The Update sent after that a Player discard a LeaderCard.
Discount
The LeaderCard that allows the Player to pay a Resource less when buys DevCard from the Table
DiscountData
It's the player with the ClientDiscount ClientLeaderCard (it extends PlayerData).
DiscountedPlayer
The type Discounted player (it extends Player).
EndgameUpdate
The Update sent when the Game ends.
EndTurnRequest
The Request sent by a player when he wants to end his turn.
EndTurnSelection
The Selection that guides the player when he chose to buy a development card.
EndTurnUpdate
The Update sent after that a Player ends his turn.
ErrorUpdate
The Update sent when a Player tries to do something he can't do for a reason.
ExistingPlayerUpdate  
ExtraDepData
It's the player with the ClientExtraDep ClientLeaderCard (it extends PlayerData).
ExtraDeposit
The LeaderCard that gives to the Player an extra level in his WareHouse.
ExtraDepositLevel
A type having an ArrayList of Resources and the only resource placeable in it.
ExtraDepositPlayer
The type Change Resource player (it extends Player).
ExtraProd
The LeaderCard that gives to the Player an extra production power.
ExtraProdData
It's the player with the ClientExtraProd ClientLeaderCard (it extends PlayerData).
ExtraProdPlayer
The type Extra Production player (it extends Player).
FaithPath
The Faith Path of one single Player: every player has his own Faith Path.
Game
An object Game is created every time some players start a game.
GameHolder
The lobby containing every game on the server
InitialPlayersSetRequest
The Request sent by a player after the Game starts.
JsonReader
An auxiliary class used for deserializing leaderCards and requests
LastTurnUpdate
The Update sent after that a Player reached the conditions to make start the last turn of the Game.
LeaderCard
The interface implemented by all the leader cards.
LineClient
The serverHandler from the client
LobbyUpdate
The Update sent before that the Game starts.
LorenzoUpdate
The Update sent after every Lorenzo's action in a SinglePlayerGame.
MainMenu
Every player has his own reference to an object of this type.
MainView
The type Main view.
MappedResource
A type containing a Resource and a String meaning a place from where take the resource (Warehouse, strongbox,...).
Market
The market of the Game containing all the Resource Players can obtain without using DevCard
MarketArray
A type having an ArrayList of Resources, an MarketDimension and an index of the market's matrix.
MarketDimension
The enum used to indicate a dimension of the Market's matrix.
MarketRequest
The Request sent by a player when he wants to take Resource from the Market.
MarketResource
A type containing a Resource and an int meaning a level of the player's deposits.
MarketSelection
The Selection that guides the player when he chose to take resources from the market.
MarketUpdate
The Update sent after that a Player takes Resources from Market.
Move1
That type of Token that, if drawn, makes Lorenzo move forward of one step on his FaithPath.
Move2
That type of Token that, if drawn, makes Lorenzo move forward of two step on his FaithPath and shuffle the stack of tokens in the game;
MoveRequest
The Request sent by a player when he wants to move Resources in his deposits.
MoveSelection
The Selection that guides the player when he chose tu sort his deposits.
MoveUpdate
The Update sent after that a Player moves his Resources in his WareHouse.
MultiEchoServer
The type Multi echo server.
NewGameRequest
The Request sent when it wants to start a new Game.
NewGameUpdate
The Update sent when a new Game starts.
Observer
The server Observer.
OtherPlayerData
The type used by every PlayerData to save and check the status of the other players in the game
PingConnection
The type Ping connection.
Player
The type representing a player of the game.
PlayerData
The type representing a player of the game, client side.
PlayerFP
A type containing a Player's ID and his faith points.
PlayerLC
A type containing a Player's ID and 4 LeaderCard he will have to choose.
PlayerST
Used in the NewGameUpdate during the initial phase of the Game A type containing a Player's ID, the faith points he obtains at the start game and the numbers of Resource he can choose.
PlayerVP
A type containing a Player's ID and his victory points.
PlayLeaderRequest
The Request sent by a player when he wants to play a LeaderCard.
PlayLeaderSelection
The Selection that guides the player when he chose to play a leader card.
PlayLeaderUpdate
The Update sent when a Player played a LeaderCard.
Ponger
Each client has an element that pong the server so it doesn't timeout.
PongRequest
Whenever the client wants to answer
Printer
Everything that has to be shown on the player's CLI is printed out by this class.
ProduceRequest
The Request sent by a player when he wants to produce.
ProduceUpdate
The Update sent after that a Player produced Resources.
Production
A type containing an ID of a card that can produce resources and an ArrayList of MappedResources.
ProductionSelection
The Selection that guides the player when he chose to produce.
Request
The interface used by all type of request the player could send.
Resource
A resource is used in the game by the players whenever they want to buy a development card or produce other resources.
Selection
A Selection guides the player through the choices he has to take when he choose the actions to do in his turn.
Server
The type Server.
SinglePlayerGame
The single player game in which a single player will challenge Lorenzo De Medici.
Slot
Contains an ArrayList of Arrays with all the DevCard in possessions by the Player.
SPEndgameUpdate
The Update sent when a SinglePlayerGame ends.
StartGameSelection
The Selection that guides the player during the initial part of the game, when he has to choose 2 leader cards and the resource he gained.
StartGameUpdate
The Update sent when a Game starts to announce its start.
StrongBox
Contains all the Resources produced by the Player.
Table
The table with all the DevCards and the Market of a Game.
TempBox
Used to place all the Resource produced by the Player in the current turn.
Token
This object is used on a SinglePlayerGame.
TurnState
The list of all the possible actions a Player can do during his turn.
Update
The interface implemented by every update.
WareHouse
Contains the Resources gained by the Player from the Market.
